name: Little Red Riding Rabbit
summary: The wolf had expected to make a meal of both Grandma and Red, but is more than willing to take Bugs as a substitute when he finds Grandma has gone to work at the factory. Although Bugs is more than capable of handling a hungry wolf, the obnoxious, loud-mouthed Red turns out to be a more serious problem.
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1944
  • 片长: 7 分钟
